content:
@James Jones - First, thanks for the new build today! :slight_smile:

RE: the new Variant profile - It looks like the Sequencing page diagram still shows everything. Do you plan to update the diagram as well?

Oh, NVM - Just noticed your note: "Still need to update figure in sequencing page, consider adding seq-phase-rel and/or region studied/haplotype/genotype as page only references one (very large) profile."
Yeah I can redo the diagram with just Variant but it may be more meaningful to draft some other content to go here
Yea, fair point - To your comment, perhaps it will make sense to show Genotype and Haplotype on that diagram as well. But yes, we likely need some additional content for the page.

Anybody know how to address the new errors when providing HL7 codings? obs-base.category has (untouched) Required Pattern: {"coding":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/observation-category","code":"laboratory"}]} which seems to be compiling to http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/genomics-reporting/null#laboratory
Nope. @Grahame Grieve has been doing some things with links and fixed values, so it's possible that he might have accidentally broken something.
